name: DearS (8)
summary: Io became aware that she is in contact of the DearS and called Ren "Gate", because Ren is the only one who can ensure the DearS' continuing existence. Io, as the "Gatekeeper", protector, and innkeeper of the slave race DearS, decided to destroy mankind which is unfit.
